statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_name, income FROM customers ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT customer_name, income FROM customers WHERE gender = 'female' ORDER BY income ASC
SELECT customer_id, age, income FROM customers WHERE income > 50000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'male' AND income BETWEEN 30000 AND 70000
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age, city FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender, city FROM Customers WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, city, country, age FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC, city ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(amount), MIN(amount), AVG(amount) FROM Purchases WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price < 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT city, state, country FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, city, state, country FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, country FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, education_level, profession, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, country FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, gender, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, education_level, profession, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income >= 50000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT last_name, first_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY state, city DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, city, state FROM customers WHERE state = 'California' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 45;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender, city, state FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city, state FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, income, education_level, occupation, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND education_level = 'College';
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;

SELECT customers.first_name, purchases.product_name, interactions.interaction_date, interactions.interaction_type FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_type = 'Feedback' AND purchases.purchase_amount > 1000;
